name: Lower Saucon Township School District, Appellant, v. Bethlehem Steel Company

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Lower Saucon Township School District, Appellant, v. Bethlehem Steel Company.

casebody.head_matter:
Lower Saucon Township School District, Appellant, v. Bethlehem Steel Company.
Argued January 10, 1963.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Morris Mindlin, with Mm Mindlin, Sigmon, Briody d Littner, for appellant.
Alfred T. Williams, Jr., with Mm H. P. McFadden, and McFadden, Riskin d Williams, for appellee.
March 19, 1963:
